import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new tag record for legacy workflows that need to categorize assets, tickets, or other entities by tag.

**Workflow Example**
1. Determine the appropriate tag type for your use case (for example, asset vs. ticket tagging).
2. Call [POST /api/v1.0/tags](/docs/api/tags/create-tag) with a name and tag type to create the tag.
3. Use the returned TagId in later tagging operations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name, TagTypeId

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a tag.","properties":{"TagId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the tag. Required for updates, generated on create if not provided."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the tag"},"TagTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Type identifier for the tag (e.g., asset tag, ticket tag)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for the tag. Null for district-wide tags."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product association for the tag"},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Scope identifier for the tag"}},"required":["Name","TagTypeId"],"title":"UpdateTagRequest"},"example":{"Name":"New Asset Tag","TagTypeId":1,"ScopeId":"district"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
